The 2022/23 campaign kicks off in just under two weeks time. 
Sheffield Wednesday remain in the third tier for a second consecutive season and will be aiming for promotion under Darren Moore.

articles.title: Robert Lewandowski says goodbye to his teammates as he prepares for medical with Barcelona - Daily Mail
articles.description: Robert Lewandowski has said goodbye to his Bayern Munich teammates as he prepares for a transfer to Bareclona. The 33-year-old striker has left the Bayern training ground
articles.content:
Robert Lewandowski has said he had eight 'special' years at Bayern Munich as he prepares to sign for Barcelona.
